website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Super Levitate is an exceptional running shoe that will allow you to float through your run. Equipped with reliable technical features, it is an enabler of superb cushioning, comfort, and support through any activity. This has been backed by several users who claim that the shoe is a high-quality running platform despite its price.
pros: According to several users, the Puma Super Levitate is very comfortable to wear
It does not require a break-in period, commended many
The shoe fits perfectly, praised quite a few
Several state that the shoe provides sufficient support
A few runners laud the shoe’s durability
cons: According to one user, it does not have enough cushioning
The heel area of the shoe does not have enough support, noted one customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet that tend to swell during the day. I have an old pair of Pumas that fit me great but were starting to wear out, so I bought these to replace them. This pair fit just right and required no breaking in to be comfortable right out of the box. What makes your life easier than a pair of comfortable shoes?
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Knickelbine

customer_reviews.title: Not leather, vinyl instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. I always buy half a size larger because he wears double socks in winter. No clue why they don't slip now that it's warm. My biggest beef, these are NOT leather. Leather needs to be removed from the description. You can always smell leather, and you can always smell vinyl. Or the lack thereof of any smell. I bought these because they're listed as leather, and in the questions, it's asked if these are leather. These aren't leather. My husband kept them because he wears them for work and his others blew out. These won't last because of the vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: iluv2garden

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit feels great
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my WIDE foot. Many puma are narrow.
customer_reviews.author: For You To Read

customer_reviews.title: No need to contemplate or procrastinate just buy.
customer_reviews.text: When looking at the pictures these trainers look pretty. The pictures don't so them justice they are just amazing. Some of the most comfortable trainers I've worn and beautiful to look at but them now before they are sold out. I'll buy another pair the moment I get paid. Delivery was as expected and box is original. Sent regular updates on delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sneakers . I like the style and how they look on me . I dont work out so these sneakers are mainly for style . I wish they would make more colors to choose from . Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Stebon

customer_reviews.title: Unique Styling/ High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Puma has become my favorite athletic shoe brand. High quality materials and unique styling and color combinations set you apart from the tiresome, bland world of sport shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Futch

customer_reviews.title: daily walker
customer_reviews.text: had to get shoes for my long daily dog walking and wanted something more substantial then the knit ones so popular now. these are black to hide dirt, light and comfortable, stay tied (a problem with some shoes) and tough enough for kicking the ball around with my dog. a short break in and they were flexible enough. i will see how long they last for the final verdict but am happy now
customer_reviews.author: bar k

customer_reviews.title: There is no break in period when first putting on these sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: There is everything to like about these sneakers, e.g. there is no break-in period, you put them on and they mold and cushion your feet, and you literally feel as if you're walking on cushions of air, levitating. I have worn Pumas for well over 45 yrs. as my athletic and daily footwear, and with each year it seems as if it is always a step ahead of all others in their design and excellence. Thank you and keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Vinyets

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes in Years!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are crazy comfortable. The padding under the ball of your feet feels like a pillow. The rubber sole of the shoe looks thin, but the padding has to be close to an inch thick. I've already looked for this shoe in other colors and will buy again when the tread eventually wears out.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who has been extremely happy with the look and fit of these sneakers. He finds them more comfortable than past purchases and tells me he would buy them again. He tends to be highly critical when it comes to sneakers so these must be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: shopperj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seem like very comfortable dance shoes. What I liked is that your foot is held secure, the shoe doesn't allow any loose play inside the shoe. I'm able to change directions easily.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too small for me, so I had to return them. I thought the design was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Soo uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these shoes but they are terrible. I figured my feet would hurt the first day but its been 1 week and my feet hurt just as bad and the first day. Can't take wearing them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shley

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEATHER!!!!  TOTALLY FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to overlook the number of reviews which clearly stated that these were not real leather. It's the very first time that I've been swindled by anyone on Amazon - this is my own fault for being so trusting. I've had these for a few months and wear them periodically, so it took some time to notice and the return window has long passed. BUT, I JUST TOOK THE TIME TO DO THIS TO SAVE SOMEONE ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: iChordz.com

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily work sneakers and its really comforatble. I can move around an entire video shoot whole day without my feet feeling fatigued at the end of the day. Still have some style hasnt stripped or chipped in about 6 months comfortable fits great and i have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Not leather as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, but there is no leather anywhere on this shoe. Even the sticker in the shoe says synthetic materials. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Rated A must buy from me and my Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these shoes we ordered two pairs this time because he has a pair before and they sold out so fast amazing shoes would definitely recommend 💯 percent fast shipping they never disappoint 😍❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and light. Using them at the gym and the white ones just look really good! The bottom have some real good grip also.
customer_reviews.author: Bakersbound

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price and well made. Needed better grip on the bottom for kids PE and this she was perfect

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It is soft, comfortable, provides support, not heavy to walk or jog in. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Toe creases
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not real. Material bends weird at the toe that causes a lumpy line. Otherwise comfortable so far.

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe. It does fit as I expected, but only because I ordered it a half size larger.

customer_reviews.text: I run a 9 on sneaker and this is a 1/2 size too small

customer_reviews.text: Great support for my treadmill exercise. Soft on impact as I run.

customer_reviews.text: Puma has come back with a great product. Fits nice,good support and nice sofy foot.

customer_reviews.title: the mesh on arch support is no good.
customer_reviews.text: If I could return it I would and exchanged it to Adidas Samba sneakers. The arch support material in the back broke after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Skakalsky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Haven't bought new shoes in years, so these were a godsend. Nice and cushioned and great for when I need to crank out that sanic speed. The picture makes them look a little sleeker than they actually are but they are the nicest pair of sneakers I own. And I've owned A LOT of sneakers for hiking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Burt

customer_reviews.title: The small print was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Amazon advertised as primarily leather with synthetics. Upon receiving, the inside tag says all synthetic. False advertising. They fit well and I'm going to give synthetic a try which will hopefully hold up to daily use. My old leather Nike's lasted a couple years. These Puma's are nice. Beware the small print!!!
customer_reviews.author: l.mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 10 but I bought 10.5 because Puma shoes tend to be a bit narrow, I love this brand, excellent design and comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Rubber on shoes came a part 6 days after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom rubber was glued poorly and started coming apart on both shoes 6 days after I received them. Thankfully I heavy duty glue to repair them otherwise they would have been returned. Do not buy these!

customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe... fits very well. The only reason I don’t give five stars is because they are still new. If they last well my rating would go up.

customer_reviews.title: fit better than my other Pumas.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Super Levitate Sneaker
product_meta.description: The super levitate continues to drive an all over supportive upper with an eva and TPU heel cushioning unit that is optimal for training workouts. All this at an accessible price point.
